org.apache.flink.hcatalog

类 HCatInputFormatBase<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.common.io.RichInputFormat<T,HadoopInputSplit>
      • org.apache.flink.hcatalog.HCatInputFormatBase<T>
  • 类型参数:
    T -
    所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, InputFormat<T,HadoopInputSplit>, ResultTypeQueryable<T>, InputSplitSource<HadoopInputSplit>
    直接已知子类:
    HCatInputFormat

    public abstract class HCatInputFormatBase<T>
extends RichInputFormat<T,HadoopInputSplit>
implements ResultTypeQueryable<T>
    A InputFormat to read from HCatalog tables. The InputFormat supports projection (selection and order of fields) and partition filters.

    Data can be returned as HCatRecord or Flink-native tuple.

    Note: Flink tuples might only support a limited number of fields (depending on the API).

    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

    • 构造器详细资料

      • HCatInputFormatBase

        public HCatInputFormatBase()

      • HCatInputFormatBase

        public HCatInputFormatBase(java.lang.String database,
                           java.lang.String table)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a HCatInputFormat for the given database and table. By default, the InputFormat returns HCatRecord. The return type of the InputFormat can be changed to Flink-native tuples by calling asFlinkTuples().
        参数:
        database - The name of the database to read from.
        table - The name of the table to read.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • HCatInputFormatBase

        public HCatInputFormatBase(java.lang.String database,
                           java.lang.String table,
                           Configuration config)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a HCatInputFormat for the given database, table, and Configuration. By default, the InputFormat returns HCatRecord. The return type of the InputFormat can be changed to Flink-native tuples by calling asFlinkTuples().
        参数:
        database - The name of the database to read from.
        table - The name of the table to read.
        config - The Configuration for the InputFormat.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

    • 方法详细资料

      • getFields

        public HCatInputFormatBase<T> getFields(java.lang.String... fields)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Specifies the fields which are returned by the InputFormat and their order.
        参数:
        fields - The fields and their order which are returned by the InputFormat.
        返回:
        This InputFormat with specified return fields.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • withFilter

        public HCatInputFormatBase<T> withFilter(java.lang.String filter)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Specifies a SQL-like filter condition on the table's partition columns. Filter conditions on non-partition columns are invalid. A partition filter can significantly reduce the amount of data to be read.
        参数:
        filter - A SQL-like filter condition on the table's partition columns.
        返回:
        This InputFormat with specified partition filter.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • asFlinkTuples

        public HCatInputFormatBase<T> asFlinkTuples()
                                     throws org.apache.hive.hcatalog.common.HCatException
        Specifies that the InputFormat returns Flink tuples instead of HCatRecord.

        Note: Flink tuples might only support a limited number of fields (depending on the API).

        返回:
        This InputFormat.
        抛出:
        org.apache.hive.hcatalog.common.HCatException

      • configure

        public void configure(Configuration parameters)
        从接口复制的说明: InputFormat
        Configures this input format. Since input formats are instantiated generically and hence parameterless, this method is the place where the input formats set their basic fields based on configuration values.

        This method is always called first on a newly instantiated input format.

        指定者:
        configure 在接口中 InputFormat<T,HadoopInputSplit>
        参数:
        parameters - The configuration with all parameters (note: not the Flink config but the TaskConfig).

      • getStatistics

        public BaseStatistics getStatistics(BaseStatistics cachedStats)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: InputFormat
        Gets the basic statistics from the input described by this format. If the input format does not know how to create those statistics, it may return null. This method optionally gets a cached version of the statistics. The input format may examine them and decide whether it directly returns them without spending effort to re-gather the statistics.

        When this method is called, the input format it guaranteed to be configured.

        指定者:
        getStatistics 在接口中 InputFormat<T,HadoopInputSplit>
        参数:
        cachedStats - The statistics that were cached. May be null.
        返回:
        The base statistics for the input, or null, if not available.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • createInputSplits

        public HadoopInputSplit[] createInputSplits(int minNumSplits)
                                     throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: InputFormat
        Creates the different splits of the input that can be processed in parallel.

        When this method is called, the input format it guaranteed to be configured.

        指定者:
        createInputSplits 在接口中 InputFormat<T,HadoopInputSplit>
        指定者:
        createInputSplits 在接口中 InputSplitSource<HadoopInputSplit>
        参数:
        minNumSplits - The minimum desired number of splits. If fewer are created, some parallel instances may remain idle.
        返回:
        The splits of this input that can be processed in parallel.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, when the creation of the splits was erroneous.

      • open

        public void open(HadoopInputSplit split)
          throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: InputFormat
        Opens a parallel instance of the input format to work on a split.

        When this method is called, the input format it guaranteed to be configured.

        指定者:
        open 在接口中 InputFormat<T,HadoopInputSplit>
        参数:
        split - The split to be opened.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, if the spit could not be opened due to an I/O problem.

      • reachedEnd

        public boolean reachedEnd()
                   throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: InputFormat
        Method used to check if the end of the input is reached.

        When this method is called, the input format it guaranteed to be opened.

        指定者:
        reachedEnd 在接口中 InputFormat<T,HadoopInputSplit>
        返回:
        True if the end is reached, otherwise false.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, if an I/O error occurred.

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: InputFormat
        Method that marks the end of the life-cycle of an input split. Should be used to close channels and streams and release resources. After this method returns without an error, the input is assumed to be correctly read.

        When this method is called, the input format it guaranteed to be opened.

        指定者:
        close 在接口中 InputFormat<T,HadoopInputSplit>
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, if the input could not be closed properly.
